thread.title: Beautiful Hotel by Arc de Triumphe
thread.title_full: Beautiful Hotel by Arc de Triumphe - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: apsmith92
title: Beautiful Hotel by Arc de Triumphe
text:
Stayed here with my girlfriend for a weekend trip to Paris. Beautiful hotel and we found a great deal on voyagepriv√©. The breakfast buffet was great and came with everything you could imagine.
The room was stunning - a large bed and the room's balcony had a fantastic view of the Arc de Triumphe.
Staff were accommodating and friendly.
Great location within walking distance of most. Also, the hotel is outside a small metro entrance which connects to most lines.
Easy to get back to airports.
